info.name: Ecommerce SaaS API V2
info.description: Comprehensive collection for testing v2 APIs with advanced filtering capabilities and complete file upload support. Includes file upload functionality for products (with multiple images), product variants, brands (logo), categories (image), users (avatar), and patterns (pattern image) with 5MB file size limit and image-only validation.
